DirectionMode: How direction to move the vertices is determined.
DistanceMode: How distance to extrude along a given direction is determined.
bUseUnselectedForFrames: When a vertex has both a selected and nonselected neighbor, use the unselected neighbor in picking an extrude frame as well.
bAdjustToExtrudeEvenly: Adjust individual extrude directions in an effort to make extruded edges parallel to their original edges.
